snippet.title: Project Loki - Official Announcement
snippet.description:
Theorycraft Games is a brand-new development team comprised of developers that have worked on major games like League of Legends, Valorant, Overwatch, Halo, Destiny, and Apex Legends. Theorycraft Games has unveiled their premiere game code-named Project Loki, a team-based, competitive PvP game that mixes a hero shooter,  action game, and battle royale. Watch the feature video to find out more along with entering the game's PC play test taking place on June 29 through 30.

#IGN #Gaming
